clinical_history: Patient presents with abdominal discomfort and bloating.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Testes are normal with normal vascularity.
Major vessels show hyperechoic waveform on Doppler.
Uterus appears normal; endometrial thickness measures 21.27 mm.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Breast tissue shows enlarged lesion measuring 16.5 mm.
Common bile duct measures 18.47 mm, within normal limits.
